channel.title: Npc help on a 317 server
channel.description:
hi i am using augeus Pkz! base to make my own server but i have came across a tricky problem, when i try to change the npc location so it goes to my new home area it doesn't work and they just stay where they are, this is annoying for me as i am trying to make my new home area look less blank i have included some pictures wich should show you what i mean sorry bout link format but dont know how to change [url=http://img148.imageshack.us/my.php?image=npcsherewantedme4.png][img=http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/3715/npcsherewantedme4.th.png][/url] [url=http://imageshack.us][img=http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/158/coordsnb8.png][/url] By [url=http://profile.imageshack.us/user/gs_pk_pure]gs_pk_pure[/url] [url=http://img354.imageshack.us/my.php?image=buttheyareheretl6.png][img=http://img354.imageshack.us/img354/5886/buttheyareheretl6.th.png][/url] [url=http://img254.imageshack.us/my.php?image=andhereey5.png][img=http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/4465/andhereey5.th.png][/url] heres my autospawn.cfg [url=http://img254.imageshack.us/my.php?image=myautospawncfgaf8.png][img=http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/179/myautospawncfgaf8.th.png][/url] please can some1 help add me on msn my addy is
tom_killer@hotmail.co.uk
or reply here your choice :) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 07:11:41 am[/size][hr]BUMP![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 07:12:15 am[/size][hr]bump!
